column4: so is it a bad idea to use my home folder from 10.04 with 10.10?
yes - although you could see what happens after you make a copy of your home directory
is that the only reason its bad?
cause i have it on a separate partition
then see how long it takes for the excretion to hit the dyson airblade
i have my home folder on a separate partition, it only takes a sec
im just wondering if i'll have any bad files or something
you may do - it's an idea to make a backup first
make a dd backup of your /home fs
i dont see why id need it but ok
you can get rid of most of your big files from the backup then :p - videos won't break it so don't copy those
you'll need to not use dd for that
i have a 30gb virtualbox hard drive file in my home dir for mac os x
